Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time spent on 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time between 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' after 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time it takes the 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to be done before 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimum time for 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to transition to any subsequent activity
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time for 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in cases where the next activity is 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in cases leading to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' in cases successfully completed without rejections
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time from 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases where rejections occur
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
